TrnCourse.name: TrnCourse
TrnCourse.description: Represents information about the authorized trainings that qualify a license or permit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this record.

TotalCredits.description: Total credits offered for the course.

TotalHours.description: Total hours needed to complete the course.
